home.title: Wedding Cellist in Cardiff | Solo Cello Music for Weddings and Events | Samantha Cello
home.meta_description: Samantha Cello is a Cardiff-based wedding cellist offering elegant live music for ceremonies and receptions across South Wales and beyond. Available for weddings, events, and receptions throughout the UK. Book your date today!

about.title: About Samantha Cello | Professional Wedding Musician in Cardiff, South Wales
